strike.narrative: In the first known US targeted assassination using a drone, a CIA Predator struck a car, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the first known US targeted assassination using a drone, a CIA Predator struck a car killing six al Qaeda suspects.
names: Qa'id Salim Sinan al-Harithi, Abu Ahmad al-Hijazi, Salih Hussain Ali al-Nunu, Awsan Ahmad al-Tarihi, Munir Ahmad Abdallah al-Sauda, Adil Nasir al-Sauda'

strike.narrative: The first known fatal US drone strike inside Pakistan killed 6-8 people, including 2 children.
strike.bij_summary_short: First known drone strike in Pakistan kills at least six, including infamous Taliban leader Nek Mohammad and two children. Wana, South Waziristan.
names: Nek Mohammad, Fakhar Zaman, Azmat Khan, Marez Khan, Shahrukh Khan, Leetak, Sher Zaman Ashrafkhel

strike.narrative: 2 people killed in a Predator strike which reportedly targeted Haitham al-Yemeni's mobile phone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two killed, including Haitham al-Yemeni an al Qaeda explosives expert, near Mir Ali, North Waziristan.
names: Haitham al-Yemeni, Samiullah Khan

strike.narrative: A failed strike destroyed Abu Hamza Rabia's house and killed 8 people, including 3 young girls.
strike.bij_summary_short: Failed strike against Abu Hamza Rabia ("al Qaeda's Number 3") kills eight including three children.

strike.narrative: 5 people were killed, including 2 children, when drones fired on a house 'for about 8 minutes.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Syrian Abu Hamza Rabia, the senior al Qaeda operative targeted in B3, was killed with two other foreign militants and two boys, aged eight and 17.
names: Abu Hamza Rabia, Suleiman al-Moghrabi, Amer Azizi, Noor Aziz, Abdul Wasit

strike.narrative: 8 people were reported killed including 2 women and 1 child.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on an unnamed alleged al Qaeda official left eight killed, including two women and at least one child.

strike.narrative: 18 civilians, including 6 children, were killed when a US Predator fired on 3 houses.
strike.bij_summary_short: A strike targeted a possible militant commanders' meeting. But main target Ayman al Zawahiri was absent. Up to 22 people died, most or all civilians, including at least five children.
strike.target: Ayman al-Zawahiri; Abu Khabab al-Masri; Abd Rahman al-Masri al-Maghribi; Abu Ubeidah al-Masri; Marwan al-Suri; Khalid Habib; Abdul Hadi al-Iraqi

strike.narrative: 80-83 civilians, including 69 children, reported killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on a madrassa (allegedly a "Taliban training camp") killed 81-83, including at least 69 children.
names: Maulvi Liaqat, Mohammad Tahir (16), Maulvi Khaleefa, Azizul Wahab (15), Fazal Wahab (16), Ziauddin (16), Mohammad Yunus (16), Fazal Hakim (19), Ilyas (13), Sohail (07), Asadullah (09), Shoaib (08), Khalilullah (09), Noor Mohammad (08), Khalid (12), Saifullah (09), Razi Mohammad (16), Mashooq Jan (15), Nawab (17), Sultanat Khan (16), Mohammad Yaas Khan (16), Qari Alamzeb (14), Ghulam Nabi (21), Ziaur Rahman (17), Abdullah (18), Ikramullah (17), Inayatur Rahman (16), Shahbuddin (15), Yahya Khan (16), Rahatullah, (17), Khan (21), Mohammad Salim (11), Shahjehan (15), Gul Sher Khan (15), Bakht Muneer (14), Numair (14), Mashooq Khan (16), Ihsanullah (16), Luqman (12), Salman (16), Jannatullah (13), Ismail (12), Taseel Khan (18), Zaheeruddin (16), Qari Ishaq (19), Jamshed Khan (14), Alam Nabi (11), Qari Abdul Karim (19), Rahmatullah (14), Abdus Samad (17), Siraj (16), Saeedullah (17), Abdul Waris (16), Darvesh (13), Ameer Said (15), Shaukat (14), Inayatur Rahman (17), Ziaur Rahman (13), Noor Mohammad (15), Naeemullah (17),        Hizbullah (10), Kitab Gul (12), Wilayat Khan (11), Zabihullah (16), Shehzad Gul (11), Shabir (15), Qari Sharifullah (17), Shafiullah (16), Nimatullah (14), Shakirullah (16), Talha (08), Jamroz Khan, Fazal Wahab (18), Rahman (13), Wali-ur-Rahman (17), Iftikhar (17), Inayatullah (15), Adnan (16), Najibullah (13)

strike.narrative: 8 people, many thought to be innocent woodcutters, were killed in a likely drone/helicopter strike.
strike.bij_summary_short: Initial claims of 30 Taliban killed were lowered to eight deaths, who villagers insist were all innocent woodcutters.
names: Katoor Khan, Taj Alam

strike.narrative: An attack on a religious school killed four people and injured three.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on a house and madrassa killed 3-4, reportedly all named civilians.

strike.narrative: 20-50 people, including children, were killed in an attack on a school and several houses.
strike.bij_summary_short: 20-34 killed in attack on a madrassa, including 'foreigners'. All killed could have been civilians and one report said children were among the dead.

strike.narrative: A missile fired from an unmanned aerial drone killed 5 and wounded 6 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: CIA drone strike kills 5-10 alleged Haqqani Network militants.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired at least 2 missiles early Wednesday morning at a house near North Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Strike injures Egyptian al Qaeda leader and ideologue Shaykh Issa al-Masri, Details later emerge via leaked US intelligence document.

strike.narrative: 5 civilians, including 3 children, were reported dead in a strike that killed 12-14 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Abu Laith al-Libi, a senior al Qaeda figure, was killed along with 12-15 others.

strike.narrative: A 2am attack on a house killed up to 13 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 8 killed, including possibly students, in strike on a madrassa.

strike.narrative: 12-15 people were killed in a strike outside Waziristan that destroyed a house and a mosque.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 12 alleged militants in an attack on the home of tribal elder Noorullah Wazir.

strike.narrative: 18 people were killed when 2 missiles hit a house in the village of Damadola.
strike.bij_summary_short: Failed attack on Abu Sulayman al Jazairi, an al Qaeda weapons expert, kills at least 12 in a rare strike outside Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 1 person was killed as unmanned US drones fired three guided missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: One killed in strike on Makeen, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A strike on a seminary killed al Qaeda's chemical weapons team, plus 2 young boys and their mom.
strike.bij_summary_short: A strike on a seminary killed al Qaeda's "chemical weapons team", one woman and up to three boys.

strike.narrative: 2 pilotless planes fired 4 hellfire missiles at about 10pm, killing between 13 and 25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 13 killed, including two named Taliban. Women and children reported among casualties. Bhagar, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two missiles hit a house owned by a local tribesman, killing between 8 and 12 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-12 people killed in attack on alleged militant house.

strike.narrative: A predator drone missed its target, hitting Sardali Khan's house, wounding a woman and 3 kids.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on al Qaeda-associated meeting killed none but injured four.

strike.narrative: 4 people, including 2 Canadians, were killed when a drone missile hit a house near Wana.
strike.bij_summary_short: Five killed including two Arab-Canadians. Korzai, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 6 people were killed and 8 others injured in a mysterious missile attack on a residential area.
strike.bij_summary_short: Woman and child killed along with four suspected militants, including two 'commanders'. Ghundi, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: No details are known about this strike, though it appears in a leaked US intelligence report.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack in unknown location kills 4-10 alleged al Qaeda militants.

strike.narrative: 5 people were killed when a drone fired 3 missiles at a house near the Afghan border.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named al Qaeda militant killed along with 4-6 others. Momadkhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 7 civilians, all women and children, were reported killed in a US drone strike.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three women and four children killed in attack on two houses in Miranshah, North Waziristan. Five 'militants' also reported killed by some sources.

strike.narrative: Missiles fired by US drones killed 23 people, including 8 of the target's grandchildren.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 11 civilians, mostly girls, killed with six others including four named militants.

strike.narrative: An early morning attack on a former school killed between 10 and 15 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10-15 alleged militants killed in Tol Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 5 people were killed in a suspected missile attack by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-7 killed including possibly Abu Ubaydh Al Tunisi, identified as a High Value Target in a leaked US intelligence document.

strike.narrative: After tribesmen fired on 3 drones circling their village, a Predator killed up to 8 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-8 killed, 9 injured in attack on Toorikhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two women and a child were killed in a 5:30am strike on 2 houses which also injured 5 men.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two women and a child killed in a strike on two houses in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: The second US drone strike of the day killed at least 20 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 21 killed including a woman and a child. Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two missiles hit a house, killing 9 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-9 people killed, including women and children.

strike.narrative: Unmanned drones targeted a house on Saturday night, killing 4 people and injuring 2 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: The house of Rahmat Jahan is attacked killing five and wounding two. Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US Predator drone killed 6 people and wounded 5 others in the village of Sam.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named al Qaeda leader killed along with 4 militants and 4 civilians. Tapargai, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: US drones struck a seminary on Thursday, killing 10 people and wounding 3.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-11 killed, possibly including children, in attack on Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A missile from a US drone killed 20 people on Sunday.
strike.bij_summary_short: Failed strike on Haji Omar kills 15-20, including at least four civilians.

strike.narrative: More than 20 people were killed when a drone fired 2 missiles, destroying a house near Mir Ali.
strike.bij_summary_short: Between 4 and 25 killed, possibly including civilians, in failed attack on al Qaeda targets. Mir Ali, North Waziristan.
strike.target: Abu Jihad al-Masri; Abdur Rehman abu Akash

strike.narrative: In the second strike of the day, US drones blew up a truck, killing between 4 and 12 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to 12 killed and Taliban leader Maulvi Nazir among 30 wounded.

strike.narrative: Up to 14 people were killed in a US drone strike, including 6 reported civilians.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to 16 killed, including 'Westerners and US citizens'. Kumsham, Miramshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 11-13 people were killed when a US drone struck a residential area in Shagai.
strike.bij_summary_short: 11-13 killed including at least three civilians. Garyom, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike in Bannu killed 4 people and injured 5 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: Al Qaeda operative Abdullah Azzam al Saudi killed with up to five others in attack outside FATA which causes uproar.

strike.narrative: A pre-dawn attack on a house in North Waziristan killed between 4 and 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two named militants and up to four others killed in Ali Khel, Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 5 people were killed in an attack on a moving vehicle Wednesday, caused by either an IED or a drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Drone strike destroys vehicle killing five alleged Pakistan Taliban.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired a missile at a Professor's house, killing 2 or 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two or three killed, possibly all civilians. Chashma, Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed in a missile attack by a suspected US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 alleged Taliban killed in Kateera, Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A missile, suspected to be from a pilotless US drone, killed 7 people on Thursday.
strike.bij_summary_short: Six or seven killed, either some 'foreigners' or all civilians, Azam Warzak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 people were killed in a night-time strike that set a house on fire.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two killed in Tapi Tool, Miran Shah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two US drone missiles killed 8 in Karikot and Shin Warsak, causing huge fires in both villages
strike.bij_summary_short: Three killed in attack on a truck in Kari Kot, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Between 2 and 4 people were killed and 4 injured in a further strike on an anti-aircraft truck.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two killed in attack on truck in Shin Warzak, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A CIA drone strike killed up to 5 people in South Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two named al Qaeda militants and up to thee other people killed in strike on vehicle, Kari Kot, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the final strike of Bush's presidency, an attack on an abandoned girls' school killed 3-4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three to four killed in last strike of Bush presidency.  Madin, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: President Obama's first drone strike killed between 7 and 15 people, including 1 child.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7 civilians and 4 or more militants reported killed in strike on house in Zharki, Mir Ali,North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Second strike of the day killed between 5 and 8 people, including 3 children.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-11 people killed, including several members of a family killed including at least three children in strike on wrong house in Dilfar, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two missiles fired from a US drone killed more than 30 people, including an 8-year old boy.
strike.bij_summary_short: 26-35 alleged militants and 8-year old boy killed in strike on house and madrassa in Zangari, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 25 killed, several injured in Central Kurram drone strikes.
strike.bij_summary_short: 30-31 killed in a strike on a camp in Sarpal, Kurram Agency

strike.narrative: Two missiles fired Sunday from American remotely piloted aircraft killed at least 8 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least seven killed in an attack on alleged TTP facility in Sararogha, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Missiles fired by an unmanned US drone killed at least 24 people and injured 30 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: 14-25 killed and 30-50 injured in attack on TTP camp in Barjo, Kurram Agency.

strike.narrative: A missile suspected to have been fired by a US drone hit a house in Janikhel, killing 5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 2-5 alleged militants killed in Sain Tanga, Janni Khel, Bannu.

strike.narrative: Up to 8 people were killed in an attack on 2 cars as they were about to cross a bridge.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-8 alleged militants killed in attack on cars and house in Maken, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A suspected US drone aircraft fired two missiles into a house in Mir Ali, killing 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 militants or civilians killed in strike on house in Sokhel, Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A pilotless US drone fired a missile in northwest Pakistan on Wednesday, killing 12 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Women and children among 12-14 killed in strike on house in Khadezai, Orakzai Agency.

strike.narrative: A suspected US drone killed 13 people in Datta Khel, including up to 4 children and 3 women.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 7 civilians, and possibly all, of 13 killed in strike on house. Datta Khel, Miramshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A suspected US pilotless plane killed 4 people in an attack on a vehicle in South Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four alleged militants killed and up to five civilians injured in strike on car and shops, Gangi Khel, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 missiles hit a house in Gangi Khel, killing at least 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to eight civilians including as many as two children killed in Gangi Khel, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A missile strike by a suspected US drone on Wednesday killed at least 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named al Qaeda leader and 5-9 others, possibly including civilians, killed in Kaniguram, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Multiple missile strikes, including an attack on an ex-school and a car, killed up to 25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 9-25 killed, possibly four civilians, in strike in Tabbi Langhar Khel, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A suspected US drone attack on a village killed 9 people and wounded 4 others Tuesday morning.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least eight alleged militants killed in attack on compound in Sara Khwara, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first confirmed deliberate CIA attack on rescuers, up to 40 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 25 people, including nine civilians, killed in a strike on house and rescuers in Kaisore, Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 5 people in South Waziristan on Sunday.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in strike on truck in Ladha South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 drone missiles killed 1 person. When rescuers rushed to the scene, 2 more struck, killing 8.
strike.bij_summary_short: 12-14 killed, including 10 civilian rescuers, in double strike in Shah Alam, Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Another strike reported by local security sources. Impact largely unknown.
strike.bij_summary_short: Strike with unknown casualty figures in Raghzai area, near Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired 3 missiles, killing at least 2 people and injuring several others.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named TTP commander among six killed in a strike on Makeen, South Waziristan

strike.narrative: Up to 80 more people were killed when several US drones targeted a funeral.
strike.bij_summary_short: 67-83 killed (including 18-45 civilians) in a strike on a funeral in Makeen, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed up to 5 people in Mantoi.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on a closed madrassa 'occasionally used by the TTP' killed either three, five or no people. Mantoi, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Another US drone attack killed at least 7 people in Kokat Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: 13-17 alleged militants killed and 27-35 injured in strike on compound in Kokat Khel, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 16 people were killed in a US drone strike when 2 missiles hit the village of Jangara.
strike.bij_summary_short: 16-18 alleged militants killed in strike on compound in Jangara, Makeen, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first of Wednesday's attacks, missiles hit the thickly-forested Karwan Manza, killing 10 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-10 alleged TTP militants killed in strike on camp in Laddha, Karwan Manza South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 40 people died when 5 US drone missiles hit a vehicle convoy in Ladha.
strike.bij_summary_short: 35-40 alleged militants killed when convoy destroyed in  Laddha, Karwan Manza, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 US drone missiles killed at least 3 people in the Painda Khel region of South Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in strike on 'communications centre' in Painda, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Another possible drone strike killed 5 people in Tiyarza.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two media sources reported a possible drone strike that killed five - this may be part of Ob28.

strike.narrative: A 'drone raid' on a house killed up to 6 people and wounded 4 more.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-6 alleged TTP militants killed in strike on house in Gariwam, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Baitullah Mehsud and as many as 10 others were killed by a US Predator drone in Zanghara.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named TTP leader dies with at least one other, in strike on Zanghara, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US missile struck a house near the town of Kani Gurram, killing at least 10 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 14-25 killed in strike on 'Taliban suicide bomber training camp' in  Saam, near Ladha, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 21 people were killed, including three women and six children.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 9 civilians including 6 children among 17-21 killed in strike on houses and madrassa in Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US missile strike from a drone aircraft Thursday killed at least eight people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Named militant leader killed with at least seven others in strike on house in Tapar Ghai, Kanigram, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 drones had been continuously flying over the town of Mir Ali since Monday morning. Up to 8 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three civilians among 5-8 killed in a failed strike on senior al Qaeda leader Ilyas Kashmiri.

strike.narrative: 12 people were killed in the 2nd drone attack in 24 hours, including 2 women and 3 children.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10-15 killed including three civilians in strike on house in Dargmandi, Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed and 2 others injured when a US drone missile struck a car near Mir Ali.
strike.bij_summary_short: Five killed including including Islamic Jihad Union leader Najmiddin Kamolitdinovic Jalolov in a strike on a vehicle.

strike.narrative: At least 12 people were killed and 5 injured in a suspected US drone attack in North Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Strike kills 10-12, possibly including civilians, in Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Missiles fired from a US drone aircraft Tuesday killed 5 people in South Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-6 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Sararogha, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the 2nd attack of the day, US drones hit a house in North Waziristan, killing at least 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least four alleged Haqqani militants killed in strike on house in Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the 4th attack since Monday evening, a missile-firing US drone killed 8 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-9 alleged militants killed in strike on cars and house in Norak, Miransha, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 4 people were killed by a suspected US drone missile in Dande Darpa Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Sameeda, who appeared to be around 6, was hurt in her right leg, while Fatima, around 4, had head injuries.
strike.bij_summary_short: Al Qaeda explosives expert Abu Musa al-Masri and 2 others killed in strike in Spalaga, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: US drone strike killed 27 people in Bajaur.
strike.bij_summary_short: 20-27 alleged militants killed in strike on compound in Damadola, Bajaur Agency.

strike.narrative: A suspected drone strike killed at least 4 people in a predawn attack.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Norak, Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 missiles from a suspected US drone aircraft killed 4 people and wounded 6.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Shanakhora, Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 8 people were killed when a US drone struck the district of Mir Ali.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three civilians, including one child, killed in a strike on a 'training compound' in Machi Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 missiles fired from a US drone hit a car near Miranshah, killing at least 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Al Qaeda planner Said al-Somali among four killed in strike on car in Miran Shah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 6 people were killed and 8 others injured in a suspected US drone strike in Ladha.
strike.bij_summary_short: Six alleged militants killed in strike on 'hide-out' in Laddha, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 2 people were killed Thursday morning when 2 drone missiles hit a car parked outside a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: 2 alleged militants killed in car in Gadda Maramay, Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: An attack with 5 drones destroyed 2 houses and 2 cars, killing up to 16 people.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired 4 missiles in the Shagga village of North Waziristan Friday, killing 8 people.

strike.narrative: A US drone missile struck a house on Thursday, killing 3 people and wounding 2 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three civilians, including one child, among up to seven killed in a strike on a Taliban commander.

strike.narrative: Missiles fired from a US drone slammed into a car, killing 3 people. It was the 2nd strike in 2 days.

strike.narrative: A US drone attack killed 5 people Sunday, including a 9 year old boy named Wajid.
strike.bij_summary_short: Five killed including 1-2 civilians, in attack on house and car in Mosaki, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At 3:30pm, 2 missiles from a US drone hit the mountainous village of Sanzalai.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-7 killed, possibly including civilians, in strike on house in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.bij_summary_short: Up to nine rescuers killed in attack on house in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone destroyed a car killing 4 men standing next to it. Next door was 3-year-old Ayeesha.

strike.bij_summary_short: 4 alleged militants killed in strike on vehicle in Boya or Mohammad Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 6 people were killed when a US drone attacked a house and motorcycle in Ghar Laley.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 alleged militants or civilians killed in strike on motorbike and house. Ghar Laley, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Four missiles from a US drone killed 3 people in Haiderkhel. Between 2-15 others were injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in attack on house in Haider Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 3 people were killed when a US drone fired 3 missiles at a house in Datta Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-7 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first of 3 strikes, a US drone destroyed a car after it parked outside a house. 4 people died.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 alleged militants killed in car in Doga Mada Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Three people were riding a motorcycle in Khar Kamar. A drone fired 3 missiles, killing 3 men.
strike.bij_summary_short: 2-3 alleged militants killed in attack on motorbike in Doga Mada Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone was chasing a vehicle. Just after parking, missiles hit the car. 6 died; 3 injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 alleged militants killed when vehicle and house struck in Razmak, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 7 people were killed. Three missiles, an unmanned aircraft, a house, in Azam Warsak.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3 Turkmenistan nationals and 2 'Arabs' reported among 6-7 dead in attack on house. Al Qaeda finance officer Abu Zaid al-Iraqi later reported killed.

strike.narrative: The following night, a US drone fired 4 missiles at a house near Miranshah, killing 11 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-11 people - possibly all civilians - killed in attack on house and car in Malik Ashdar, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Missiles struck a car. Moments later, more missiles struck a house. 5 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-7 alleged militants killed in attack on car and house in Mohammad Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Fazal Karim's house was destroyed by a US drone. 5 people were killed, 3-7 others were wounded.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5 killed - either militants or civilians - in attack on house in Landidog, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Hours later, in a second attack, 5 people were killed. Drones hit a house in Datta Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5 alleged militants killed in attack on house in Datta Khel. North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: The first drone strike of the day killed 3-4 people in a pickup truck.
strike.bij_summary_short: A double strike on a vehicle (and possibly a house) killed at least six people including rescuers.

strike.narrative: Minutes later, 5 rescuers -- Jaffar, Faraz, Musa, Kamal, Noor -- were met with more missiles.
strike.bij_summary_short: A double strike on a vehicle (and possibly a house) killed at least six people including rescuers.
names: Noor Gul, Jaffar, Faraz, Musa, Kamal

strike.narrative: US drones destroyed a white car near Spinwam, killing 4 men on the spot.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four unknown persons killed in strike on car in Ghoroski, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 4 people were killed in Azam Warsak.
strike.bij_summary_short: 0-4 killed and 0-5 injured in an attack which destroyed a car but may have missed the occupants.  Azam Warsak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 6 people were killed in a house and car Sunday. 'Several drones were still flying in the area.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 6-7 alleged militants killed in strike on house and car in Spalga, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 6 people Monday.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 alleged militants killed in a moving car in Malik Jashdar, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 4 people killed when a US drone hit a car in Datta Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on either house or car kills 4-5 in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 42 people, mostly civilians, sat near a bus depot, talking. A drone ended their conversation.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on tribal meeting kills 26-42 people, 31-42 of them civilians, at a jirga or tribal gathering in North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Drones struck a pickup truck and motorcycle near the village of Angor Adda, killing 7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 6-7 alleged militants killed in strike on vehicles and building in Angor Adda, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Missiles fired. At least 25 people killed, including 5 women and 4 children in a nearby house.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to 25 killed, including 1-8 civilians, in strike on house in Spinwan, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the country's first unmanned attack since 2002, a US drone killed 2 people in Shabwah.
strike.bij_summary_short: A fresh attempt was made to kill US-born cleric Anwar al-Awlaki in a co-ordinated drone strike. Instead two AQAP-linked brothers died, identified by Yemeni government officials as Abdullah Mubarak and Mosaad Mubarak (or al-Harad).
names: Abdullah Mubarak, Mosaad Mubarak

strike.narrative: 6 civilians -- Samad, Jamshed, Daraz, Iqbal, Noor, Yousaf -- died when a drone fired at 'armed men.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 15-18 killed, including six civilians, when restaurant hit along with targeted religious school in Dwa Tooe, Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 4 drones hovered. 5 killed, 4 injured. 'No way to ascertain the identity of the slain people.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in strike on vehicle in Angor Ada/ Baghar, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone attacked a pickup van in Datta Khel, killing 7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-8 alleged militants killed in strike on van and possibly house in Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Friday afternoon, drone hovering. 5 people, 4 missiles. Bodies unrecognizable 'due to burning.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in strike on car in Doga Mada Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 6 people killed when US drones hit a house in Mir Ali.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on compound kills 4-10 alleged militants in Sandasa, Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Minutes later, another drone fired two missiles at a vehicle nearby, killing 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 alleged militants killed in strike on pick-up truck in Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 4 people in a vehicle near Miranshah.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 alleged militants killed in attack on moving vehicle in Tappi, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Missiles killed 7 people in a van. Official: 'I do not know whether there was a high-value target.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-7 alleged militants killed in strike on van in Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 7 people killed, including 4 civilians, when US missiles struck the coastal town of Zinjibar.
strike.bij_summary_short: US airstrike in the city of Zinjibar, most likely a drone, killed Abu Ali al-Harithi and a number of other militants as well as four civilians.

strike.narrative: While drinking tea in an apple orchard, Ilyas Kashmiri and 9 other men were slain from above.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to 5 named al Qaeda killed among 8-12 alleged militants in strike on orchard in Ghwa Khwa, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At about 2am, three US drone missiles hit a house in Shalam Raghzai, killing 7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: House destroyed killing 7-9 alleged militants in Shalam Ragzhai, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 8-10 people were killed in a second attack. Witnesses: '7 civilians' among the dead.
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-10 killed, including possibly 7 civilians, in attack on seminary in Wacha Dana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Third strike of the day killed 3 people in a vehicle. Up to 5 drones seen flying in the area.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in attack on car in Darnashtra, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the forested valley of Shawal, 18-23 people were killed in a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: 18-23 alleged militants killed in attack on compound in Zoynari, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: After following a pickup truck, four US drones killed 4 people, blowing the vehicle 'to pieces.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 4 militants or civilians killed in strike on truck in Shawal, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: An unmanned aircraft killed 1 person in Zinjibar.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least one top insurgent was killed in the US military-led strikes by unmanned aircraft.

strike.narrative: Nader Shadadi was not home. His mother, and 11-year-old Moti’a Haidara, were killed by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: A security official from Abyan province claimed that one of three linked strikes against militants resulted in the deaths of three civilians.
names: Moti'a Ahmed Haidara

strike.narrative: 10 people killed in a house near Wana.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attack on house kills 3-10 alleged militants in Wana, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: No one was killed. Drone missiles hit a car, but its occupants had escaped into an orchard.
strike.bij_summary_short: None killed as car occupants escape drone strike in Karez, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 5 civilians -- a taxi driver, two students, a pharmacist, and a shopkeeper -- were killed in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-6 civilians killed in strike on car near Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 6 Yemeni civilians wounded by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Six civilians were wounded in an apparent drone strike targeting 'senior jihadists'. However, no AQAP militants were reported to be hit in the attack.

strike.narrative: 5 people killed in a car. As tribesmen rushed to the scene, drones struck again. 2 more killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7 alleged militants and rescuers killed in strike on car in Khardand, Kurram Agency.

strike.narrative: Minutes later, a suspected US drone attacked a nearby house, killing 5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-5 alleged militants killed in strike on house in Zarakai, Kurram Agency.

strike.narrative: In Somalia's first known lethal drone strike, 1-3 people were killed and 'others' were injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the first known lethal drone strike in Somalia, Predators struck a militant training camp 10km south of Kismayo. Further missiles hit a second target near the airport. At least 2 people were killed.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Shawal, the first of two attacks on the day.
strike.bij_summary_short: 6-12 killed in strike on truck and compound in Shawal, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Hajji, a local resident, said 20 civilians were killed in a house. Officials: 12 'militants.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 14-21 alleged militants killed in attack on 'training camp' in Shakai, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 4-6 people killed. The guesthouse, located close to a market, 'was completely destroyed.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Named Western al Qaeda militant among 4-6 reported killed in strike on guesthouse in Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 10 people killed Monday. US drones attacked a house and car in the village of Gorwaik.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-12 killed, including possibly 5 civilians, in strike on van in Borvaika/ Gorwak in North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: On Tuesday morning, a US drone fired 2 missiles at a house in Gurwak, killing 12-25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 12-25 alleged militants killed in strike on compound in Gorvak/ Shawal, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 13 people, including 3 students--Hafiz, Waheed, and Fayaz--were killed by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on a house and/ or car killed 5-13 alleged militants, including 'foreigners'. Three students 'with militant links' were killed in either this or Ob230, named as Hafiz Bilal, Waheed Ullah and Fayaz. Barmal, South Wazir

strike.narrative: Linked attacks on a house and car killed up to 15 people, including 4 civilian rescuers.
strike.bij_summary_short: 13-15 alleged militants killed in strike on car and house in Dre Nishatr, Shawal valley, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the 4th attack of the day, missiles struck a car, killing 'a local villager.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-9 people were killed in strike on car. At least one civilian casualty. Datta Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: An airstrike, likely including a drone, killed up to 50 people. CNN reported 30 civilians dead.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least six people were reported killed in a US strike in Abyan province. The New York Times claimed the same strike killed eight, whilst CNN claimed that as many as 50 people were killed.
names: Hadi Mohammed Ali, Abu Bilal

strike.narrative: A US strike on a car targeted Fahd al-Qusaa, but he left moments before the missiles.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US strike on a car targeted Fahd al-Qusaa, also known as Quso, an al Qaeda leader and suspect in the USS Cole bombing. He reportedly left the car minutes earlier and was unharmed.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles destroyed a house in Mir Ali, killing 4. 'The death toll was expected to rise.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 4 alleged militants killed in Khushali Toori Khel, Mir Ali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: At least 5 people killed in Karadeef.
strike.bij_summary_short: Five AQAP militants, including a field commander, were killed by a US drone strike on Karadeef, in western Zinjibar.

strike.narrative: 15 people killed and 17 wounded in three air strikes. Officials: US Predator drones responsible.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two or three airstrikes killed up to 16 alleged militants, including local al Qaeda leader Nader Shadadi.
names: Nader Shadadi

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 4-6 people in Azam Warsak. Riaz, a local resident, said all were civilians.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 people - possibly all civilians - killed in strike on car in Azam Warsak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 3 people killed in a drone strike on a moving car. Bodies were damaged 'beyond recognition.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 alleged militants killed in strike on car. Qutab Khel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 21 people. Not known 'if any high-profile militants were among the dead.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 20-25 killed and vehicle destroyed in pre-dawn strike. Miranshah, North Waziristan

strike.narrative: As people started their Ramadan fast, missiles struck near a girls' school, killing 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-7 killed, including possibly 3-4 civilians, and 2 injured in a strike on a housing compound and vehicle. Miranshah, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Up to 4 people killed in Shin Warsak, reportedly while 'at the house of a tribal elder.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 killed and 2 injured in strike on house. Shin Warsak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first of two attacks, a US drone hit a house, 'killing 3 men, 2 children and a lady.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-7 killed, including possibly 0-4 civilians, and 3 injured in strike on vehicle. Norak, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: An hour after locals ended their daily fast,' an unmanned Predator drone killed 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: The News was the single source for reports of a second strike on a house on August 22 that killed a family of Arabs, 'three men, two children and a lady. Local villagers said an Arab family was residing in the house and all those died in the missile attack were Arab nationals.' The newspaper speculated that this strike killed Atiyah abd al-Rahman (see Ob239).

strike.narrative: 6 killed in Abyan. Source unable to confirm whether air strike was Yemeni Air Force or US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: 6 killed in Abyan. Source unable to confirm whether air strike was Yemeni Air Force or US drone

strike.narrative: One day after Eid, a US drone killed 7 people in North Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Urdu TV station Ajj reports that an evening strike killed up to seven alleged militants in an unspecified location in North Waziristan, a day after the end of the four-day Eid holiday. No further details are known from this single source.

strike.narrative: 10 people died when a US drone struck an abandoned hotel and primary school in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10 al-Qaida militants were killed and dozens of others were injured' when a US drone struck 'several targets' in Abyan, Xinhua said. Predator drones also 'bombed an abandoned hotel and a primary school on the eastern outskirts of Jaar city' in Abyan.

strike.narrative: A CIA drone destroyed a car, killing 4-5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 killed and 2 injured in strike on 10th anniversary of 9-11. Hisokhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first of 2 airstrikes, US drones killed 4 people. Their target, Saeed al-Shehri, escaped.
strike.bij_summary_short: There were two alleged US drone strikes reported on this day, killing 4 and up to 7, respectively.

strike.narrative: In the second air strike of the day, 7 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: A second strike reportedly targeted militants in the southern port city of Shaqra, killing up to seven people.

strike.narrative: Two US drone missiles hit a house in the village of Khushali Turikhel, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-8 alleged militants killed and 3-4 injured in strike on house and vehicle. Khushali, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: US drones attacked the port city of Kismayo. Residents reported 'explosions around the city.'
strike.bij_summary_short: The United States launched a series of drone attacks on al-Shabaab in Kismayo, according to residents, who reported attacks on three locations.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Azam Warsak, narrowly missing the people inside.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to four killed and up to two injured in strike on a compound. Azam Warsak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: A suspected US drone killed 3 people in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 killed and 5 injured in strike on a vehicle. Baghar, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Two US citizens--Anwar al-Awlaki and Samir Khan--were killed by US drones.
strike.bij_summary_short: Anwar al-Awlaki, the US-born cleric, became the first US citizen to be deliberately killed by the CIA in a drone strike. 3 others were killed as well.
names: Anwar al Awlaki, Samir Khan, Abu Muhsen al Maribi, Salem al Marwani

strike.narrative: A suspected US drone fired two missiles, killing 4 farmers and 'at least 10 camels.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Four Somali farmers were reported to have been killed in a possible drone strike in Dolbiyow Village, 35km east of Dhobley. The farmers and their camels were killed moments after al-Shabaab fighters fled the area in vehicles, witnesses said.

strike.narrative: On Thursday, the first of two drone strikes killed 4-6 people in North Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 killed and 4 injured. Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Hours later, missiles hit a house and car in South Waziristan, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 killed in strike on a compound. Zeba Pahar, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: In the first of several attacks on the day, a US drone struck a house in Azan.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the first of several attacks on this day, a drone attack struck a house in the Azan district of Shabwah, but the occupants of the house had left two minutes earlier.

strike.narrative: Three men stood near a car, talking. CIA missiles took their lives from above.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-6 alleged militants killed in strike on a vehicle. Danda Darpakhel, North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: While eating dinner with his teenage cousins, Abdulrahman, a 16-year-old US citizen, was killed by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Drone strike killed 7-9 people, including a 16 and 17-year-old boy. Abdulrahman al-Awlaki, the 16-year old son of Anwar al-Awlaki, was one of the people who perished.
names: Abdulrahman al-Awlaki, Ahmed Abdulrahman al-Awlaki, Sarhan al-Qusa

strike.narrative: A third possible drone attack killed up to 17 people on Friday night.
strike.bij_summary_short: A third possible drone attack killed up to 17 people on Friday night.

strike.narrative: Azzedine, 15, was grazing camels. His father and brother, 14, were 'scattered into pieces.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Saleh Qaid Toayman and his 14-year-old son were reported killed in an overnight strike in Azan. They were grazing camels 'in an area known to be controlled by al-Qaida,' and had then slept by a mosque, according to Toayman's 15-year-old son Azzedine who survived the strike.
names: Saleh Qaid Toayman

strike.narrative: US drones fired eight missiles at a building in Baghar, killing 4 people and wounding 3 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 killed and 3-7 injured in strike on a compound. Angor Adda, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 3 people killed. Nine missiles. From the rubble, three bodies: Hazrat, Sher, Amir.
strike.bij_summary_short: There were reports of a further strike in South Waziristan on Maulvi Nazir's forces, which killed up to seven alleged militants. Three of those killed were named as Hazrat Ali, Sher Ali and Amir Hamza - possibly 'low level Taliban commanders.'

strike.narrative: 11 civilians killed and more than 20 wounded. Drones seen hovering for 'the last few days.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 11 civilians died and more than 20 others were wounded after a possible US drone attacked on Afmadow town in the Lower Juba region.

strike.narrative: Two missiles struck the village of Bobar, killing between 13 and 22 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 13-22 killed and 6 injured in a strike.

strike.narrative: Maulvi lived. But his 20-year-old brother, Hazrat, and cousin, Meraj, did not. 4-6 killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-6 killed and 3-4 injured in a strike on a vehicle. Azam Warsak, South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: The second attack of the day killed 4 people in a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: A second strike of the day on either a moving vehicle or a house in North Waziristan killed 4-6 alleged militants, according to Pakistani security officials. No further details were given.

strike.narrative: 3 chromite miners--Khastar, Mamrud, and Noorzal--were killed in a car. 4-6 dead, 2 injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: Strike on a vehicle killed 4-6.

strike.narrative: Tariq, 16, and Waheed, 12, were driving to pick up their aunt. A drone ended their journey.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on a vehicle near the town of Mir Ali, North Waziristan killed 2-4 people, including at two civilians.

strike.narrative: 3 people killed in Darpakhel Sarai.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on an alleged militant housing compound near Miranshah in North Waziristan killed up to three people and injured three others, according to local officials. Dawn reported that the casualties were part of the Haqqani Network.

strike.narrative: Five US drone strikes' killed an unknown number of people in Rumeila.
strike.bij_summary_short: The militant stronghold of Rumeila was targeted by 'five US drone strikes,' killing an unknown number of people.

strike.narrative: 1-2 people were killed in the town of Afgoye.
strike.bij_summary_short: Missiles were fired at a training camp in Afgoye, Lower Shabelle, according to al Shabaab. 1-2 reported killed. Unclear who was responsible for the strikes.

strike.narrative: Nine people were sleeping. At 3:45am, a US drone fired missiles at their house, killing 7.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7 killed and 2-4 injured in strike on a house in Miranshah.

strike.narrative: Deep in the mountains, 15-22 people were killed by missiles from five US drones.
strike.bij_summary_short: 16-22 killed in strike on two housing compounds in Babar Ghar.

strike.narrative: In Razmak, at least 4 people were killed when US drones fired missiles into a building.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the third strike in as many days, CIA drones attacked a compound in North Waziristan, killing 7-9.

strike.narrative: A US drone attacked the town of Zinjibar, killing one person.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US drone strike reportedly killed Abdulrahman al-Wuhayshi, the younger brother of Nasser al-Wuhayshi, a Yemeni who leads AQAP.
names: Abdulrahman al-Wuhayshi

strike.narrative: Missiles destroyed a mudbrick house, killing 4. A mother and son, who were inside, survived.
strike.bij_summary_short: 1-4 people killed in a strike on a house near Miranshah. Aslam Awan (aka Abdullah Khorasani), a senior operations operative for al Qaeda  is believed to be among dead.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed at least 8 people Thursday.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-9 alleged militants killed and 2-3 injured in a strike on two vehicles near Dogga.

strike.narrative: Hours after his wife gave birth in a London hospital, 27-year-old Bilal was killed by a drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three missiles fired from a suspected drone operated by JSOC killed British-Lebanese militant Bilal Al-Barjawi, also known as Abu Hafsa.
names: Bilal Al-Barjawi

strike.narrative: Up to 5 people were driving when the missiles struck. Their vehicle was 'engulfed by fire.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 alleged militants killed and 1 injured in a strike on a vehicle near Deegan.

strike.narrative: At least 13 people were killed from above.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10-14 people killed in Abyan.
names: Mouwhahhad al-Maaribi, Ibrahim Al-Najdi, Abed Al Farraj Al-Shamri, Saleh Al-Akili, Abdul Munim al-Fathani

strike.narrative: Drone missiles hit a house, killing 10. 'Almost all the men were burnt beyond recognition.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 9-10 alleged militants killed and up to 12 injured a strike on a house near Miranshah.

strike.narrative: Badar, living in a rented house, was killed with 4-7 others. His wife and daughter were injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-8 killed, possibly 2 civilians, in a strike on a house near Miransha.  Badar Mansoor, a local Pakistani al Qaeda leader, and his wife and child are believed to be amongst dead.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed at least 5 people in a house. Several others were wounded.
strike.bij_summary_short: 6 alleged militants killed and up to 7 injured in a strike on a house near Spalga.

strike.narrative: In the second attack of the day, drone missiles hit a pickup truck, killing 10-15 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10-15 alleged militants killed in a strike on a vehicle in Mir Ali.

strike.narrative: 4 people dead. US official: 'a white Kenyan reported killed in the attack was not the target.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Hours after Secretary Clinton told the London Somalia conference that airstrikes against al Shabaab 'would not be a good idea', a US drone strike killed up to seven alleged Islamists in Lower Shabelle.

strike.narrative: Samir was in a large pickup truck. Above him, a US drone. Missiles killed up to 12 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-15 alleged militants killed and 3 injured in a strike on a vehicle in the Mandao borderlands area. Amongst dead was German citizen Samir H, believed to be one of the most dangerous Islamists in the country.

strike.narrative: Seven miles from the first strike, a US drone killed 6 people in a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two sources reported a second strike. The first reportedly hit a vehicle, killing up to 15 militants. The second strike was said to have hit a house 12 kilometres away, killing 'six Uzbeks.'

strike.narrative: Salim's two brothers -- a teacher and a cellphone repairman -- were killed with 21-32 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: A late evening airstrike on Bayda by US drones struck a gathering of alleged militants. As many as 34 'AQAP militants' died. Two brothers of local businessman Salim al-Barakani - one a teacher, the other a cellphone repairman, were among the civilians killed.
names: Hadaar al-Homaiqani

strike.narrative: Up to 24 people were killed in Jaar and Zinjibar, bringing the weekend death toll to 58.
strike.bij_summary_short: Air strikes in Jaar and Zinjibar killed up to 24 alleged militants. Although initially reported as the work of the Yemen Air Force, a senior Yemen government official told CNN that the attacks were the work of the US, part of a three-day offensive.

strike.narrative: Five drones struck the town of Jaar, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: An air attack on a militant-occupied factory where arms were allegedly stored killed three near Jaar. Ansar al Sharia said US drones carried out the early evening strike, with up to five drones reportedly taking part.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 4-5 people in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 people were killed in a strike on a moving vehicle. CNN reported that the strike appeared to be the work of the US.
names: Nasser al-Thafry

strike.narrative: Hafeez, Shamsullah, Wajahat, and Abdullah were killed. 3 others were 'mutilated beyond recognition.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 6-8 alleged militants belived to be senoir commanders of a Taliban faction were killed and 2-4 injured in a strike on a vehicle.

strike.narrative: Four drone missiles hit a house and pickup truck, killing 7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7 unknown alleged militants killed and 3 injured in a strike on a vehicle in the borderlands of North and South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: US drone missiles killed at least 30 people Thursday. Dozens of others were injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: According to local Yemen officials, three areas in Zinjibar were struck by US drone strikes, killing at least 30 al Qaeda fighters.

strike.narrative: One missile pierced the ceiling. More demolished five nearby shops. 4 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: A Miranshah house destroyed killing 4 alleged militants.

strike.narrative: 4 people killed in a Hyundai. 6 civilians wounded; Mohamed died. A 'shower' of shrapnel.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four alleged AQAP militants died and three were 'critically injured' after a US drone struck their vehicles. 6-9 others were injured, including 5 civilians. One of the civilians, Mohamed, would later die.
names: Mohamed Saleh al Suna

strike.narrative: Up to 38 people were killed in 'multiple airstrikes.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Multiple airstrikes killed as many as 38 'suspected al Qaeda militants' in Lahj and Abyan over a 48-hour period, according to CNN. A number of officials confirmed US involvement

strike.narrative: On Saturday night, 8 people were driving to Marib. A US drone fired a missile, killing them all.
strike.bij_summary_short: News agencies reported a night time US drone strike on a moving vehicle in Shabwah province. The Yemen Air Force lacks the technical ability to carry out such a strike.

strike.narrative: US drones and Yemeni warplanes bombed the southern province of Abyan, killing at least 16 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: The Yemen Defence Ministry reported that 'Yemeni-U.S. joint air raids bombed al-Qaida hideouts in the southern province of Abyan, killing at least 16 militants', according to Xinhua. Other agencies did not specify US involvement.

strike.narrative: In Shabwah, a US drone killed 8 people in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: The other militants, 8, were killed when a US drone targeted their car in the province,' alsahwa-yemen.net quoted a tribal source as saying.

strike.narrative: On Wednesday evening, a US drone killed 14 people and wounded 10 others on a desert road.
strike.bij_summary_short: A targeted evening strike on an 'al Qaeda convoy' reportedly killed up to 14 alleged militants near Loder, Abyan Province. A local government official told Xinhua that the attack was the work of a US drone.

strike.narrative: 7 people were killed when a drone turned their car into 'a charred skeleton.'
strike.bij_summary_short: An evening airstrike on a vehicle killed at least three Ansar al-Sharia members, among them reportedly Mohammed al-Sabri, a 'leading militant'. Associated Press cited two Yemen military officials as saying that US drones had carried out the attack in Al Bayda Province, with a security official telling AFP the same. Eyewitness Abdel-Salam al-Ansi told the agency that he heard a strong explosion and had rushed outside: 'The car had been turned into a ball of fire.'
names: Mohammed al-Sabri

strike.narrative: Up to five US drone strikes killed 5-7 people in the town of Azzan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to five drone strikes killed at least five militants in the southeastern Shabwah province. CNN reported militant hideouts, checkpoints, training facilities and weapons warehouses were targeted in the strikes.

strike.narrative: Missiles killed 12-17. 'Unclear' if strikes were carried out by Yemeni Air Force or US drones.
strike.bij_summary_short: As many as 17 alleged militants were killed in a series of of strikes in the south of the country. AFP said it was unclear whether the strike was carried out by the Yemen Air Force or US drones.

strike.narrative: US drones fired missiles at a car in Al-Samdah, setting it ablaze and killing 3-4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least four militants were killed when a drone strike destroyed two of three cars driving through the desert area of Sanda in central Marib province. Two senior security officials told CNN that US drones conducted the strike.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed Monday. Mohammed, who lives nearby, said he sees drones 'almost daily.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A possible drone strike hit vehicles in Shabwah province leaving three dead and two injured. Local Mohammed Bindighar told AP he had seen drones circling overhead almost daily for the last five months.

strike.narrative: After hearing an explosion, residents saw two pilotless drones. 3 people were killed in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three alleged militants were killed in a possible drone strike in the southern city of Mudiyah. Reuters reported the strike targeted the alleged militants in a vehicle. Residents said they saw two drones after hearing an explosion.

strike.narrative: US drone missiles struck a high school in North Waziristan, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-6 alleged militants killed and up to 3 injured on a strike on an ex-girl's school in Miranshah.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed when a missile hit their SUV. 'No details' on their identities.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three alleged militants were killed driving through the northern province of al-Jawf. A tribal source told AFP the car was completely destroyed and all its occupants killed. AP reported Yemeni officials 'had no details on the source of the attack or the identity of the three.'

strike.narrative: On Monday, while driving in a car, 4 people were killed near the town of Lawder.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four alleged militants were killed in an airstrike near the town of Loder. The strike hit a vehicle according to a local government official.

strike.narrative: The third attack in two days hit a vehicle near Zinjibar, killing 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A strike hit a vehicle near Zinjibar killing three alleged al Qaeda militants. A Yemeni presidential aide told CNN the Yemen government had approved a series of US drone strikes on militant positions in the south of the country. Since mid-April there had been at least two US drone strikes a day, the aide continued.

strike.narrative: Missiles from a US drone killed 13-15 people in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three Yemeni security officials told CNN a US drone attacked a militant training camp outside the southern town of Jaar, killing up to 15.

strike.narrative: 9 people killed in Shawal. 'Pakistan said the drone strike was illegal and counterproductive.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 8-10 killed and one injured in a strike. Disputes on wether the dead were militants or civilians.

strike.narrative: Nasser, 19, was tending to his farm when Fahd arrived. The drone tore them both to pieces.
strike.bij_summary_short: Fahd al-Quso, who admitted to being part responsible for the death of 17 US sailors, died in the attack in Shabwa province. Also initially reported killed was al-Quso's nephew Fahed Salem al-Akdam, described as a 'senior AQAP leader.' However the Washington Post later identified the man as 19-year old farm worker Nasser Salim, who was no relation to Quso.
names: Nasser Salim, Fahd al-Quso

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 5-12 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A series of strikes in the small hours killed up to 8 in Abyan province.

strike.narrative: A second US drone attacked the town of Shaqra, killing 2-4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: AP reported two more alleged militants killed in a second strike on Shaqra, northeast of the provincial capital Zinjibar. The Yemen Observer reported AQAP claims that a drone killed four men in the strike.
names: Kheldoon al Sayed

strike.narrative: In Shabwa, an apparent US drone strike set a vehicle on fire, killing its passengers.
strike.bij_summary_short: A reported US drone strike took place in al-Hosoon, near the city of Marib. A tribal chief told Reuters that 'a drone fired two rockets at two vehicles, killing five Al-Qaeda members.'
names: Mohsen Abdul-Rahman Al-Youssefi, Saleh Mohammed Jaber Shabwahni, Abu Mutib Al-Yamani, Abu Laith Al-Hadrami, Abu Mohammed al Shihiri, Abu Abdullah al Sanaani

strike.narrative: 7 people were killed on a desert road in Hareeb. Drone missiles destroyed three pickup trucks.
strike.bij_summary_short: Agencies reported a second strike of the day, also on a convoy of vehicles: 'One drone fired rockets at a convoy of three pick-up trucks travelling on a desert road in Hareeb area of Shabwa province.
names: Ali Hassan Ali Gharib al Shabwahni, Hassan Saud Hassan Bin Mouaily, Hamid Nasir Al-Aqraa, Mohsen Saeed Kharassan, Ahmed Saleh Mohammed Al-Faqeer, Abdullah Ali Muhammad Miqan, Mohammed Saleh Bakeer Al-Faqeer, Aref Issa Chabwi, Mubarak, Saleh Al-Nasser Al-Nassi, Abu Obeida al Masri

strike.narrative: The last drone attack of the day killed 6-10 people near Aden.
strike.bij_summary_short: A possible third drone strike of the day killed between 6 and 10 alleged al Qaeda militants at a 'hideout', according to a local Yemeni official.

strike.narrative: 42 people--including 26 civilians--became rubble. 'The plane was gray. It looked like an eagle.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 14 people were killed in an airstrike in a residential area of Jaar. Two or more strikes in quick succession reduced an entire block to rubble. Initial reports from government sources claimed two or three senior al Qaeda militants were killed as well as at least eight civilians. This changed as more details emerged in subsequent reports. Amnesty International identified 14 civilian victims by name - including a pregnant woman. Survivor Samir al Mushari told USA Today 26 civilians died.
names: Mariam Abdo Said, Majed Ahmed Abdullah Awad, Nuweir al Arshani, Abdo Said, Salem Mohsen Haidar al Jalladi, Adeeb Ahmed Ghanem al Doba'i, Mohammed Abdullah Saleh Hussein, Munir bin al Haji bin al Assi, Ahmed Abdullah Ahmed al Shahari, Salem Abdullah Ahmed Abkar, Hussien Mubarak Ahmed, Abd al Rahman Motahhar, Hafez Abdullah Mubarak, Mohsen Ali Salem, Amir al Azzani

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed in a car. @BaFana3, a Sanaa-based lawyer, reported the attack on Twitter.
strike.bij_summary_short: Three alleged militants were killed in a possible US drone strike in the eastern province of Hadhramaut. Reuters reported a car apparently carrying explosives was destroyed when the overnight strike targeted a convoy.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed 2 people in Bayda.
strike.bij_summary_short: A second air strike of the day destroyed a vehicle in the southern province of Bayda. Sources told AFP and Associated Press the strike was carried out by a US drone.

strike.narrative: One year before the President gave a major speech, a US drone killed 4 people in a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 alleged militants killed and several injured in a strike on a house in Datte Khel Kalai.

strike.narrative: The second drone attack in 24 hours killed 10-12 people in a mosque.
strike.bij_summary_short: 10-12 killed and 3 injured, mostly civilians, after a strike hit a house and a nearby mosque during morning prayers.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles struck a bakery in the Miranshah market, killing 3-4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 alleged militants killed and 2 injured on a strike on bakery in Miransha bazaar.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed up to 5 people and wounded 4 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to five alleged militants were killed and four wounded in a possible drone strike in the centre of the country. Anwar al Awlaki's brothers-in-law Qaed and Nabil al Dahab were targeted but survived.

strike.narrative: The second strike of the day hit a car. 5 killed. A 'badly burnt body was not identified.'
strike.bij_summary_short: In the second strike of the day five alleged militants were killed in the eastern province of Hadhramaut, including local commander Saleh Abdul Khaleq Ali Jaber. Local media later named others killed as Hussein Rabi, Malik Bakotain and Muhammad al Saqqaf. A fifth badly burnt body was not identified.

strike.narrative: Two drone missiles hit a house in Mir Ali, killing up to 10 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 5-10 alleged militants killed and 4 injured in a double strike on a house in the village of Khassokhel.

strike.narrative: Up to 5 killed. 'Vehicle caught fire and the bodies of the people inside were badly burnt.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 2-5 alleged militants killed in a strike on a vehicle in Datta Khel.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 11-12 people in a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: Local officials and residents told agencies that a US drone had killed 11 -12 men they suspected of being Islamic militants, who were meeting at a house (or 'communications compound') in al Mahfad.

strike.narrative: Khalil and Rehmanullah were riding on a motorcycle when a US drone fired two missiles at them.
strike.bij_summary_short: 2-4 killed - two alleged militants and possibly two civilians in a strike in a vehicle in Khawashi Khel.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired four missiles at a group of people gathered in mourning, killing up to 10.
strike.bij_summary_short: 7-10 killed and 7-10 injured in a strike on a house where a Taliban funeral took place. Possible civilian deaths.

strike.narrative: Up to 6 drones fired missiles at a house, killing Abu. More than a dozen others died as well.
strike.bij_summary_short: 1-18 alleged militants killed in a strike on a militant compound. Abu Yahya al-Libi, al Qaeda's effective number two, is believed to be amongst dead.

strike.narrative: US drone strikes killed 27 people. Officials: 'No senior al Qaeda leaders died in the attack.'
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones hit southeastern Yemen, killing as many as 27 alleged militants. 'Dozens' reportedly wounded.

strike.narrative: 9 more people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US drone struck a house and car in Azzan, killing nine alleged militants in the early morning.

strike.narrative: 4 men were traveling in a vehicle when multiple missiles destroyed their car.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4 alleged militants killed in a strike on a vehicle traveling east from Miranshah.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike hit the town of Azzan. 'Casualty figures were unknown'.
strike.bij_summary_short: The Yemen Times reported a US drone strike hit Azzan in Shabwa province, described as AQAP's 'last stronghold' in the province.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles hit a market, killing 3. 'When they started rescue work, another missile hit.'
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 alleged militants killed in a strike on a shop or house in Miranshah bazaar. AFP reports witness saying another instance of a follow-up strike.

strike.narrative: A missile entered Ali's house. His 4-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter died in his arms.
strike.bij_summary_short: A house in Shaqra was hit in a strike that killed six children and one woman. It was 'not clear whether the Yemeni air force launched the strike, or whether it came from a US military or CIA drone.' NPR told the Bureau the strike came after Friday prayers. Ali al Armoudi survived the strike and told NPR his four-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter 'died in his arms on the way to the hospital.'

strike.narrative: Hussein, a Red Cross worker, died in an air strike. Unclear if it was Yemeni plane or US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: An airstrike by an unknown party in northern Abyan killed Hussein Saleh, a worker with the International Committee of the Red Cross. According to an ICRC spokesman 'it was an air strike. We have no additional details whatsoever.' An ICRC spokeswoman told the Bureau by email that Saleh 'was out side an ICRC vehicle when shrapnel hit him. He died from the shrapnel injuries. The strike did not hit the ICRC vehicle directly.' Three other ICRC staff with Saleh were unhurt in the strike the spokeswoman added. Another ICRC member told the BBC that it was not clear whether the attack was the work of a US drone or the Yemen Air Force.

strike.narrative: A US drone destroyed a small pickup truck in the suburbs of Aden, killing 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US drone has killed three alleged AQAP members, including one senior commander. The identities of those killed were not reported but a security official said a drone fired two missiles on a convoy which destroyed their pick-up truck. Military officials said the vehicles had been pursued by US drones, causing fear among local residents.

strike.narrative: On Tuesday night, a US drone killed 4 people in Shawal.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 4 alleged militants killed when a CIA drone struck a house in the late evening. The strike was reportedly targeting alleged militants linked to Hafiz Gul Bahadur.

strike.narrative: 8 people were killed when a US drone fired two missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: CIA drones struck a house killing 6-8 people. The strike came around 7am, reportedly destroying the house.

strike.narrative: Two drone strikes hit two cars; 4 killed. 'Flames so intense' no one could look for more bodies.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to five alleged militants were killed in an evening drone attack. The Defence Ministry said two of the dead were senior AQAP figures named Hussein Rubay and Fahad al Harithy. It was not clear if one or two drones took part in the strike, and if one or two cars were hit. Witnesses said while four bodies were pulled from the wreckage of the first vehicle. But said 'the flames were so intense in the second vehicle that no one could approach to check for any casualties.'

strike.narrative: Either Yemeni airplanes or US drones killed up to 13 people in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: Airstrikes have targeted the only town in Abyan province 'where jihadists still have a strong presence.' US officials have confirmed American strike jets are flying missions over Yemen from nearby Djibouti.

strike.narrative: 17-24 killed. As rescuers retrieved bodies, drones continued to hover, firing more missiles.
strike.bij_summary_short: In an evening strike, CIA drones struck a house killing at least 17. This was the first strike since Pakistan re-opened its borders to Nato convoys after a seven month diplomatic stand-off.

strike.narrative: As many as 14 people were killed when US drones fired 8 missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: 11-14 were killed when up to 8 missile hit a compound alleged to belong to militant comander Sadiq Noor, ally of Hafiz Gul Bahadur.

strike.narrative: US drone missiles 'pounded a house and car', killing 5-7 people and injuring 4 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-7 alleged militants died when CIA drones fired 6 missiles at a house. 1 or 2 vehicles exploded. The attack took place hours after Pakistan ambassador to Washington again called for a halt to drone strikes.

strike.narrative: While driving through Hadhramaut, 5 people were killed. A drone fired missiles at their car.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to five were killed and two more injured while traveling through east Yemen. A possible US drone targeted the men in an evening strike. 'A drone fired two missiles at an all-terrain vehicle - killing its five occupants,' according to a local official. The bodies 'were found completely burnt with the completely destroyed car'.

strike.narrative: 2 dead. Residents 'recognized the sound of the drone,' which had been flying overhead for hours.
strike.bij_summary_short: Suspected US drones targeted two vehicles, killing seven in an evening strike.

strike.narrative: At least 3 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a small pickup truck.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to three people were killed and two injured in an evening air strike.

strike.narrative: As residents celebrated Eid al-Fitr, a US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 5 people killed as tribesmen gathered for Eid, declared early in Waziristan. One named militant was killed, and his wife. A house and car were hit in the attack.

strike.narrative: For the second time in 12 hours, a US drone attacked a village in Shawal, killing 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two vehicles were hit in an early morning strike, killing at least 4. The vehicles were reportedly traveling from Miranshah.

strike.narrative: The third drone strike in 24 hours killed 2 people near the wreckage of Sunday's 1st attack.
strike.bij_summary_short: A further 2-3 people were killed when CIA drones returned, reportedly targeting the wreckage of the vehicles destroyed in the day's earlier strike (Ob286).

strike.narrative: Badruddin died in a signature strike. CIA drones fired six missiles, killing 5-25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Badruddin Haqqani, son of the Haqqani leader and the network's senior military commander, may have been killed when 5-25 people died in a 7pm strike.

strike.narrative: In a string of three drone strikes, US missiles slammed into a mud building, killing 6.
strike.bij_summary_short: 13-18 people were killed and 14 injured in a coordinated series of strikes that hit villages in the Shawal valley around noon. The strikes came 'minutes apart'.

strike.narrative: Minutes later, 4 people were killed in Dara.
strike.bij_summary_short: In a second strike of the day, CIA drones reportedly fired two missiles on a wall compound.

strike.narrative: In the 3rd attack of the afternoon, US drones fired 5 missiles at 2 cars, killing 3-8 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: In the third coordinated strike at least three people were killed.

strike.narrative: A drone fired three missiles at a car. Two missed. Residents pulled 4 bodies from the wreckage.
strike.bij_summary_short: After twenty days without a reported strike, a suspected drone killed at least two people in vehicle driving from Hadramout to Mareb province. A second car reportedly escaped unscathed.

strike.narrative: Salem denounced Al Qaeda. No matter. While arguing under palm trees, 5 men were incinerated.
strike.bij_summary_short: As many as seven people were reportedly killed as they travelled through the village of al Qatn. Up to four missiles were fired at the village causing extensive damage to homes and terrifying the local residents sufficiently for some to be rushed to hospital with shock. At least two civilians were killed in the strike and testimony from their relatives formed part of a submission to an April 2013 Senate subcommittee hearing on the constitutional and counterterrorism implications of targeted killings.

strike.narrative: 8 'heavily armed' men were killed while driving through the isolated desert district of Hawra.
strike.bij_summary_short: Eight people were killed as they drove through Hadramout province, reportedly local commanders of the Yemen-based al Qaeda offshoot. One report said the men were traveling in an armoured car between Qatan and Khashgha when they were struck at 7.30am. Six bodies were taken to Seiyun hospital while two extremely burnt corpses were left at the scene.

strike.narrative: US drones fired a barrage of missiles at a vehicle and a house, killing 4-6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Attacks at 9am on a housing compound and a vehicle reportedly killed 4-6 people.

strike.narrative: 14 people, 3 of them children, were packed into a Toyota. 'Chaos. Flames. Corpses.' 12 killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones or jets killed 12 civilians in a botched attack on an alleged senior militant. Eleven died immediately and one subsequently of his injuries. The fourth airstrike in six days, the casualties including women and three children according to local sheikh Ahmed Ali and other locals said a 10-year-old girl and her 40-year-old mother were killed.
