Both were corroborated by a report compiled by three human rights groups, submitted to a US Senate subcommittee hearing in April 2013. 'The bodies were charred like coal. I could not recognize the faces,' said Ahmed al Sabooli the dead girl's 22-year-old brother.
names: Abdullah Muhammad Ali Al Qadari (25 years), Mabrook Mouqbal Al Qadari (13 years) (aka Mabruk  Muqbil al Daqari), Nasser Salah (60 years), Raselah Ali (55 years, Nasser Salah's wife), Daolah Nasser (10 or 12 years, Nasser Salah's daughter), Abdullah Ahmed Abed Rabbo Robich (28 years), Saddam Hussein Mohamed Massad (28 years), Ismail Mabkhout Mohamed (30 years), Abed al Ghani Mohammed Mabkhout (12 years), Masoud Ali Ahmed Mouqbal (45 years), Jamal Mohammed Abad (30 years),

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 5 people in the village of Al-Ain.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to six people were killed and three injured when a US drone reportedly fired eight missiles a house in Hadrhamout. As many as four of the dead were reportedly civilians, three foreigners and one Yemeni.

strike.narrative: On Saturday morning, a US drone killed 4 people in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: The Yemen Observer was the sole source to report that US drones killed four people including the brother of an al-Qaeda leader the US had attempted to kill days earlier. Abdulraoof Ahmad Nasser al Thahab was supposedly driving his car in the Qaifa area of Radaa when a drone attacked him.

strike.narrative: A drone did not kill 'Guantánamo prisoner 372,' although 5-7 others died.
strike.bij_summary_short: Seven people including AQAP's second-in-command Said al Shehri (aka al Shihri) were reportedly killed in a strike on a car and house in Hadrhamout, eastern Yemen, according to US and Yemeni officials. The following month, a recording purporting to be al Shehri emerged, in which he claimed the false rumours of his death were 'to cover up the killing of innocent Muslim civilians'.

strike.narrative: 2-4 people were killed in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: An airstrike killed at least two people in Abyan province.

strike.narrative: 3 people killed in a car. Official: 'The identity of the militants was immediately unclear.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A car was destroyed when to missiles and three to four militants, possibly linked to Hafiz Gul Bahdur, were killed. This was the first strike in 20 days, and the first after protests over a blasphemous video left up to 17 dead.

strike.narrative: Around 9pm, a US drone fired missiles at a house in Mir Ali, killing 5-8 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 5 were killed, inlcuding senior al Qaeda member Abu Kasha al Iraqi, when two missiles destroyed a compound at around 9pm.00
strike.target: Abu Kasha al Iraqi, Saleh al Turki

strike.narrative: US drones fired four missiles at a car, killing 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US drone strike reportedy targeted either a car or motorbike near Mir Ali in North Waziristan, killing 2-4 alleged militants.

strike.narrative: Three US drone strikes killed 5 people. Residents: drones had been flying 'for nearly a week.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A suspected drone strike targeted suspected al Qaeda or Ansar al Sharia militants in the mountainous desert region of al-Saeed in Shabwa province in the late morning, killing at least three and injuring several others. Local media reported five missiles being fired in a multiple strike.

strike.narrative: Several US drones flew into the area before dawn and fired four missiles,' killing 5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A pre-dawn attack destroyed a compound belonging to Maulvi Abdullah, described as a local cleric, killing five alleged militants and injuring three more, according to reports.

strike.narrative: A US drone 'fired four missiles at a madrasa, or seminary,' killing at least 16 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four missiles were reportedly fired at a madrassa belonging to Maulvi Shakirullah, killing 16-26 and wounding many more.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles hit a farmhouse, killing Nader and up to 8 others, some of them local teenagers.
strike.bij_summary_short: In a dawn attack, a series of missiles were fired at a targets on the outskirts of Jaar, apparently targeting al Qaeda militants on the verge of launching a suicide attack on military targets. Reuters reported three separate strikes targeted a farmhouse, although ANI/Xinhua claimed the strikes hit two separate gatherings of alleged al Qaeda militants and AP quoted locals saying they had seen two cars ablaze.

strike.narrative: 4 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: An evening strike on a car killed 'at least four' alleged al Qaeda members in Maarib province, several miles outside Maarib city, sources reported. Local al Qaeda commander Sanad Ouraidan al Aqili (aka Sanad Abdulla al Aqili) was reported to be among the dead. 'Aqili's three companions, whose bodies were blown to pieces, have not been identified yet,' a local policeman told AFP.

strike.narrative: Nabila's grandmother was outside her home picking vegetables when a missile came out of the sky.
strike.bij_summary_short: A grandmother was killed when a drone hit a house and car. Several of her grandchildren were injured.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed in a suspected drone strike in northern Yemen. Local al Qaeda commander Omar Saleh al-Tais (aka Attais) was initially reported killed.

strike.narrative: Less than 24 hours after the 44th President's reelection, a US drone strike killed 2 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: As many as three people were killed in a suspected US drone strike. Their vehicle was destroyed less than 24 hours after President Obama was reelected for a second term.

strike.narrative: At least 3 people were killed and 4 others injured when a US drone fired missiles at a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: A few hours after Taliban commander Maulvi Nazir was injured in a suicide bombing, 1-4 people were killed in a drone strike.

strike.narrative: US drone missiles killed a man 'who was praying in an open field outside his home.'
strike.bij_summary_short: The second strike on the Shin Warsak area in three days reportedly killed Abdul Rehman al-Zaman Yemeni, described as 'a mid-level al Qaeda commander, equivalent to a colonel'.

strike.narrative: Up to 11 people were killed when a US drone fired several missiles into a house near Mir Ali.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-11 were killed, reportedly including senior al Qaeda commander Sheikh Khalid Bin Abdul Rehman al Hussainan, in the first strike in North Waziristan for 43 days. The Prime Minster Pervez Ashraf complained to US ambassador Olson the same day.

strike.narrative: On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a house, destroying two rooms, a car, and 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: 3-4 were killed, including an alleged militant commander Mohammad Ahmed Almansoor. A compound and a car were destroyed in the strike.

strike.narrative: Two drone missiles hit a house, killing 4 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three alleged militants were reported killed in a strike on a house near Mir Ali.

strike.narrative: The first of two US drone strikes targeted a vehicle in central Bayda, killing 2 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two men were killed in a suspected US drone strike in the southern Bayda province. It was the first strike in Yemen for 47 days and local media reported it hit a car.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles hit a soccer field, killing 4 people. Hamzah, 16, 'has not been the same.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to five more alleged militants were killed in the second suspected US drone strike of the day.

strike.narrative: 2 men were killed by a pilotless aircraft while riding on a motorcycle.
strike.bij_summary_short: Missiles fired at a moving motorcycle killed two alleged al Qaeda militants near the town of Shehr, the site of a strike four days earlier.

strike.narrative: US drones fired two missiles at a house, killing 4 people and injuring 2 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: 4-5 people were killed in a strike in the Shawal Valley area on the border of North and South Waziristan.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed when a drone fired missiles at a vehicle.
strike.bij_summary_short: Missiles hit a Land Cruiser travelling on the outskirts of al-Manaseh village, near Radda, in the fourth strike in a week. At least three alleged al Qaeda members died, including Saleh Mohammed al Ameri, described by unnamed local officials as a senior al Qaeda operative. 'Their bodies were charred and the car was completely obliterated,' a tribesman told Reuters. 'Their bodies were not recognisable, but the government says they're from al Qaeda.'

strike.narrative: Sometime in January, a US drone targeted Adel. It missed. 'Another drone killed him immediately.'
strike.bij_summary_short: In February AFP reported Adel al Abab (aka Adil al Abab, Abu al Zubair) was killed in the second of a pair of strikes in a mountainous region in the eastern Shabwah province. An al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP) source told the agency: 'A drone strike had targetted Sheikh Adel al-Abab's vehicle but he escaped and fled to a mountainous region where a raid by another drone killed him immediately.'

strike.narrative: Maulvi was killed on his way from Bermal to Wana. 'Five other people were also killed.'
strike.bij_summary_short: In one of their most significant strikes in recent years, CIA drones killed Maulvi Nazir, the powerful leader of the so-called 'good Taliban'.

strike.narrative: A drone killed 3-6 in a car, firing '2 more missiles as people tried to rescue the occupants.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A strike on a vehicle near Mir Ali, North Waziristan, reportedly killed 3-6 people.

strike.narrative: An unmanned aircraft fired missiles at 3 people. Their bodies were 'unrecognisable.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed in a reported drone strike on a vehicle in a 'mountainous area' near Radaa. The following day Reuters reported that local tribesmen demonstrated in Radaa against US drone strikes. One told the news agency that 'seven innocent civilians' had been killed in recent strikes.

strike.narrative: Around 2:30am, up to 18 people were killed when US drones fired ten missiles in Babar.
strike.bij_summary_short: Alleged TTP commander Wali Muhammad Mehsud - reportedly responsible for training suicide bombers - among the dead after as many as five CIA drones bombarded Babar Ghar.

strike.narrative: Yasin's wife and daughter died with him when US drones fired 8 missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: Alleged al Qaeda deputy commander of militant training in Pakistan and Afghanistan killed in the first of twin strikes near Mir Ali

strike.narrative: Noor's two-room house was leveled by a drone. Residents: 3 of the 11 missiles did not explode.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 2 killed in second strike, 15 minutes after the first near Mir Ali.

strike.narrative: Six drones were in the sky. Missiles hit a house. More missiles hit a motorcycle. 6 killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three killed in a strike on a motorcycle and house or compound.

strike.narrative: The first drone strike missed its target; missiles landed in a nearby orchard.
strike.bij_summary_short: The first of a barrage of strikes to hit central Yemen missed its target. Xinhua reported the strike missed a vehicle in an orchard in the al Masil area of Wadi Abeeda.

strike.narrative: Later in the evening, 4 people were killed when a drone fired missiles in Marib.
strike.bij_summary_short: Several sources, Reuters among them, reported a drone destroyed the vehicle it missed in the first strike. However AFP reported the four occupants had escaped on foot after their narrow escape earlier in the evening. Associated Press, Al Jazeera and Yemen Post identified up to six possible civilian casualties over the course of the day.

strike.narrative: Up to 6 people were killed in Wadi Abida. It was the last strike of the night.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two were killed in the last strike of the night, although a military vehicle stolen from the Yemen army and carrying six was reportedly destroyed. AFP initially reported that the strike killed four people from the 'al Haytak clan, part of the Abida tribe' without specifying if they were also al Qaeda militants. However the agency subsequently reported five alleged al Qaeda militants perished in the strike, including Hamad Hassan Ghreib (aka Amhed Bin Hassan Ali Gahreib).

strike.narrative: 3 people killed in a car. 'Their identities are not yet known.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A fourth strike was reported by the Yemen Observer. Ali al Ghulaisi, spokesman for Marib's governor, said three alleged militants were killed when a car was destroyed in a desert area of Marib near the border with Jawf province.

strike.narrative: Up to 4 men were driving on the Sanaa-Marib highway when a US drone fired missiles at them.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two men were killed while driving on the Sanaa-Marib highway. Witnesses told Reuters a US drone targeted the vehicle northeast of the capital. Security officials said three people were injured in the strike.

strike.narrative: An evening strike targeted a vehicle in al-Jawf, killing 3-5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: An evening strike reportedly targeted vehicles at an alleged militant training ground, killing at least three and injuring 'several'.

strike.narrative: Up to 7 people died when a drone destroyed a Toyota. Bodies were burned 'beyond recognition.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A Toyota Hilux was reportedly 'totally destroyed' and the bodies burnt beyond recognition. Casualty reports have varied but a clear picture of the strike emerged in the months after the attack.

strike.narrative: A second possible drone attack missed its target and left 2 children dead in their home.
strike.bij_summary_short: A second possible drone strike of the day killed two or four people according to conflicting media reports. The Los Angeles Times reported the strike hit two motorcycles - its intended target - and killing the alleged militants. However anonymous sources gave a contradictory account to Xinhua. They said the strike missed the bikes, hitting a house belonging to Abdu Mohammed al-Jarrah. Two of his children were reportedly killed and three more family members injured.

strike.narrative: At noon, between two and six missiles landed on a house and killed up to 5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: CIA drones destroyed a house and killed at least 3. Between two and six missiles reportedly hit a building, which caught fire.

strike.narrative: 6-9 people were killed when a US drone 'pounded' two mud-built houses in South Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: CIA drones destroyed a house, killing at least 6, in an area reportedly dominated by the TTP.

strike.narrative: A drone fired missiles at men riding on horseback, killing them and their horses instantly.
strike.bij_summary_short: Drones kill at least one alleged militant, reportedly on horseback in North Waziristan. The horse died with its rider.

strike.narrative: Up to 4 people were killed at a market in Datta Khel.
strike.bij_summary_short: Either a house or vehicle was destroyed, killing at least three alleged militants.

strike.narrative: Six drones had been hovering. At sunset, one fired missiles at a house, killing 4-6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least four killed in first strike for 24 days. The dead were badly burnt and went unidentified after the third consecutive strike on Datta Khel set a house on fire.

strike.narrative: Drone missiles destroyed a house in Wana, killing 4-6 people and injuring 7 others.
strike.bij_summary_short: CIA drones destroyed a house in South Waziristan, killing at least four, the day after the ICRC's president criticised the US' drone campaign in Pakistan.

strike.narrative: In the farming town of Wessab, a drone hovered. 5 people were killed in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: Five alleged al Qaeda militants were killed in the first US drone strike in almost three months. Journalist and activist Farea al Muslimi, a native of Wessab, contested the depiction of al Radami as an al Qaeda commander, although he also reported the view that al Rademi could easily have been arrested. Al Muslimi posted updates to Twitter from Sanaa as information came to him from friends and family in Wessab. And he said most people he spoke to said al Radami was not a part of AQAP. Al Muslimi: "In an area like Wessab, there is nothing easier than capturing a man like al-Radmi. Two police officers would have been more than capable of arresting him."
names: Hamid al Radami, Mukram Ali Ahmed Hamoud al Haj, Najem Addin Ali Abdullah al Raai, Ghazi Hamoud al Imad, Ismael al Magdishi

strike.narrative: Missiles hit a house at dawn, killing 2 people. A woman and child were among the injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: A dawn strike on a house in Marib province reportedly killed two alleged al Qaeda militants and wounded up to three others. Local media reported a Saudi and an Egyptian were killed while a woman and child were injured.

strike.narrative: On Friday night, a US drone fired missiles at a truck in Al-Mahfad, killing 4-7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones reportedly destroyed a truck filled with explosives, killed at least four people. The dead were allegedly militants although a 'local dignitary' told AFP he could not say whether the four 'were Islamist militants'.

strike.narrative: The second drone strike in three days killed 2 men in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: The second strike in three days killed two men in central Yemen. Two alleged al Qaeda members were killed 'as they left a farm on a motorbike' according to Yemen's defence ministry website.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a mud-built house in Chashma, killing 7 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: The Pakistan Taliban's second in command Wali ur Rehman was reportedly killed in the first CIA strike in Pakistan for 42 days. At least three other people were killed in the attack in the Miranshah area of North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: On Saturday, two US drone strikes killed 7 people in their cars.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two vehicles carrying alleged AQAP militants were destroyed in either two separate strikes or single strike by a pair of aircraft. At least seven people were killed in the attack. Anonymous and named Yemen officials have said US drones carried out the strike.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed 7 people in Shawal.
strike.bij_summary_short: A night-time strike reportedly killed seven alleged militants and wounded others on the border of North and South Waziristan, Pakistani intelligence officials said. 'The US drone fired two missiles targeting a militant compound and killing at least seven militants,' an unnamed senior intelligence official told AFP.

strike.narrative: On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing Hassan, his brother, and 'three others.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Multiple missiles struck a vehicle in the northern province of al Jawf, killing between two and six alleged militants. A local reporter tweeted that Huraydan had died alongside two relatives, including his 10-year-old brother.

strike.narrative: At least 17 people were killed when US drones fired four missiles at a house.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least 16 people were killed when CIA drones hit a house and a vehicle in or around the Miranshah bazaar. Casualty figures were low in initial reports but rose as the day wore on. By around 11am local time Reuters and AFP were reporting 17 killed in the strike.

strike.narrative: On Saturday night, an American drone fired missiles at a motorcycle. 2 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: A drone strike killed two alleged militants riding on a motorcycle and damaged nearby buildings in the village of Mosaki, near Mir Ali.

strike.narrative: A US drone killed 6 people in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: A night-time strike on two vehicles travelling in convoy reportedly killed at least four alleged militants in the al Mahfad district of Abyan province; some sources put the death toll as high as eight. It was the first reported attack in seven weeks.

strike.narrative: 8 people were having dinner when a US drone fired missiles at them.
strike.bij_summary_short: A drone fired missiles at a home in the Shawal Valley, killing at least five alleged militants, with some reports suggesting eight had died. News reports carried different, apparently contradictory narratives of the strike. Locals told NBC the drone struck as a group gathered for Iftar dinner - the breaking of the fast that takes place each night during Ramadan.'The militants, including Arab fighters, were having an Iftar dinner in the compound when the drone fired two missiles. Later, an hour after the drone had disappeared, a group of militants arrived and started pulling out bodies,'

strike.narrative: Early on Tuesday, in the town of Saeed, a US drone blew 3 people and a car 'to pieces.'
strike.bij_summary_short: A suspected US drone strike killed three people in a vehicle in the southern province of Shabwa. Two Yemenis and one Saudi Arabian, all alleged militants, were killed.

strike.narrative: In the fourth drone strike since Saturday, 3-4 people were killed in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: A suspected US drone killed at least four people on the day Yemen's President Hadi visited the White House to discuss counter-terrorism and political reform. It was the third strike in a week.

strike.narrative: Two US drone strikes killed 4 men in Marib.
strike.bij_summary_short: Four alleged AQAP militants were killed in a suspected drone strike. The men were killed when as many as five missiles hit their vehicle as they drove through the central province of Marib in the early hours. All four in the car were Yemeni and the attack 'turned [the vehicle] into a ball of fire', a tribal source told AFP.

strike.narrative: Up to 7 people were killed when US drone missiles destroyed a pair of cars.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least six people were killed in the early hours in the second strike in two days and fifth inside two weeks. A drone fired at least six missiles at two cars in a remote area, witnesses and local officials told Reuters. Local residents said they saw two vehicles and several bodies on fire at the scene. One of the dead, Sarhan al Thamlaqi, was named by local paper Yemen Post. He was reportedly not on a list of 25 AQAP operatives wanted for planning operations in Sanaa and other Yemeni provinces.

strike.narrative: 6 people were killed at dawn. 'The drones circled the air for a while after the attack.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to six people were reported killed in the third air strike in three days and sixth in under two weeks - a frequency of strikes not seen since the start of the year. The strike destroyed one or two vehicles at dawn - according to Yemeni media one vehicle was destroyed, killing four, and the second escaped the attack. Reuters reported two drones took part in the attack, remaining over the strike area for 'a while after the attack'. A Yemeni official told the Associated Press the bodies were seen lying charred alongside their vehicle. The anonymous source said five of the dead were Yemeni while the sixth was of another Arab nationality. However local security officials told CNN only four of the dead had links to AQAP - two were civilians.

strike.narrative: The second drone strike of the day killed 2-3 people in a Toyota.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least two people were killed in the second strike of the day. The attack hit at around 4pm local time, destroying a car, reportedly a Toyota Hilux. It was travelling through the eastern province of Hadramout. Witnesses reported seeing drones hovering over the area since dawn.

strike.narrative: For the third time in one day, a US drone fired missiles at a car. 3 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed in a night strike on Hadramout - the third strike in three days. An unnamed official told CNN one of the three dead was a member of al Qaeda. However Yemeni officials told BBC Arabic that four alleged militants were killed in Wadi al Jadd. And Reuters reported three men were killed as they travelled in a vehicle in an area called Ghail Bawazeer. Residents heard a large explosion and later saw the car destroyed, the agency reported. Anonymous US officials confirmed drones carried out the attack.

strike.narrative: At least 2 people were killed by a US drone while driving on a mountain road.
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones returned for the ninth time in 13 days killing at least two alleged al Qaeda militants. The men were travelling in a vehicle through Lahj province when the drones struck. Some reports said the attack targeted two vehicles, which were transporting weapons. The drones either destroyed both or one vehicle managed to escape, depending on the report. The attack came late in the evening in a mountainous area of the province. Activist and journalist Farea al-Muslimi later tweeted that three civilian bystanders were injured, and provided their names: Sidki Muhammed Ali, Ali Abdullah Hassan, and Fahmi Ahmed Hassan.

strike.narrative: A possible US drone strike 'obliterated' a car, killing 2 people inside. Unclear who they were.
strike.bij_summary_short: Reuters is currently the only western news outlet reporting a late-night drone strike in Shabwa province. A local official told the agency a suspected US drone attacked a vehicle. 'The car was completely obliterated and the two men inside it were killed,' he said. There was no information about the identity of the dead men, although Reuters described them as 'suspected Islamist militants'. Locals also mentioned rumours of the strike on Twitter.

strike.narrative: Hours after Qaid's marriage, two US drones launched missiles at his car, killing up to 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A senior militant leader was targeted and killed in a pre-dawn strike. Suspected US drones attacked a vehicle between midnight and 2am, killing both occupants including senior leader Qaid Ahmad Nasser al Dhahab. Sources alleged US drones destroyed the vehicle killing two before returning to hit the target again, killing at least two more.

strike.narrative: At least 4 people died by drone. Official: 'We do not know the identity of those killed.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three alleged militants were killed in an attack on what was reported to be either a vehicle near a seminary or a house in the Mir Ali area. One person was reported critically injured and taken to Mir Ali hospital. The strike, which took place at around 12.30pm, 'destroyed the vehicle and severely damaged the walls of the seminary.'

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people. Official: 'death toll may rise.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least five alleged militants were killed in the second drone strike in a week. Two or three missiles were fired on a house intelligence sources said belonged to the Haqqani Network in an area was reportedly under Haqqani control. Anonymous intelligence officials also said 'seven badly burnt and mutilated bodies were pulled from the wreckage after the drones disappeared'.

strike.narrative: Four missiles struck a pair of houses in Shawal. Up to 7 people were killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least six people died in the first CIA drone strike for 16 days. Four missiles reportedly hit two houses. The identify of those killed was not immediately known, an anonymous Pakistani official said. Local TV news reportedly said the strike hit at 3pm local time. The houses were 'reduced to debris'.

strike.narrative: On Sunday morning, a US drone strike killed 3-6 people in North Waziristan.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three were killed when drones fired missiles on a house in North Waziristan. The strike hit around 11am local time; the house was destroyed. This was the second drone strike on Darga Mandi this month.

strike.narrative: The second strike in two days killed 4 people in Datta Khel. 'Several others' were injured.
strike.bij_summary_short: Drones hit North Waziristan for the second time in 24 hours, killing at least three. The drones again targeted a house, at about 4am local time according to one report.

strike.narrative: Hassan heard a crash. Saw a drone 'disappearing far into the sky.' 2 people killed in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: Two people were killed in an attack on a vehicle. Four witnesses reportedly said the men were militants and were Somali. One was reportedly Ibrahim Ali Abdi (aka Anta Anta), a senior al Shabaab commander responsible for several bomb attacks in the country. Abu Mohamed, an al Shabaab militant, also said Abdi was among the dead.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing at least 3 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones killed up to five and injured three more in the first strike for a month,. The unmanned aircraft targeted a house and car in or near a bazaar in Miranshah, the capital of North Waziristan.

strike.narrative: Four missiles came for Hakimullah, ending the lives of up to 25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: US drones reportedly killed TTP leader Hakimullah Mehsud in a strike on his car or house a few miles from Miranshah, the capital of North Waziristan. He was killed in what could be one of the bloodiest strikes of 2013: at least three and as many as 25 people were reportedly killed.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed 3 men in a car.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed when an airstrike hit a car or Toyota Hilux travelling in the Ghayl Bawazir area of Hadhramaut.

strike.narrative: Just before sunrise, a drone fired missiles at a seminary, killing 2 teachers and 3 students.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least five people were killed in the first strike outside Pakistan's tribal agencies. CIA drones reportedly killed a number of named alleged militants including a senior Haqqani Network commander. Several missiles were fired on a Madrassa reportedly linked to the Haqqani group in the Hangu district of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province. The strike hit at around 5am local time.

strike.narrative: Doctors at the Miranshah hospital received two wounded men. Missiles hit a house, killing 3.
strike.bij_summary_short: Up to three people died in a drone attack on a house near Miranshah. The strike hit around midnight and the house was reportedly destroyed.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed 3 people in a car. 'The suspects' identification wasn't possible.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed in a strike on a vehicle in eastern Yemen. A moving vehicle was destroyed and the bodies of the three alleged al Qaeda members were left charred, an unnamed Yemeni security official said. It was not possible to identify the dead, the official added.

strike.narrative: Fifteen people were on their way to a wedding when a US drone 'missed its target,' killing 12.
strike.bij_summary_short: The attack reportedly hit a wedding convoy or procession, killing civilians, although according to one source it targeted a dozen al Qaeda members. A security official said: 'An air strike missed its target and hit a wedding car convoy, ten people were killed immediately and another five who were injured died after being admitted to the hospital.' The attack 'left charred bodies and burnt out cars on the road'.
names: Hussein Mohammed Saleh Al Ameri, Mohammed Ali Massad Al Ameri, Ali Abdullah Mohammed Al Tays, Zeidan Mohammed Al Ameri, Saif Abdullah Mabkhout Al Ameri, Hussein Mohammed Al Taysi, Motlaq Hamoud Mohammed Al Taysi, Saleh Abdullah Mabkhout, Aaref Mohammed Al Taysi, Saleh Massad Al Ameri, Massad Dayfallah Al Ameri, Hussein Mohammed Al Tomayl Al Taysi, Salem Mohammed Ali Al Taysi, Ali Mohammed Abdullah Al Taysi, Rajeh Ali Massad Al Taysi

strike.narrative: Third drone strike of the week hit a car in Al Qatn, killing 2 people.
Floating on the river between Gerdi and Khyber, a boat was hit with drone missiles. 7 people died, 2 injured.
At least 4 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a building.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three people were killed in the first Christmas day drone strike on Pakistan recorded by the Bureau since the strikes began in 2004. Although the dead reportedly could not be identified, they were allegedly Afghan militants.

strike.narrative: A US drone strike killed 2 men in a pickup truck.
strike.bij_summary_short: An attack on a vehicle killed suspected AQAP members in the southern city of Shiban. Initial reports disagreed on how many had been killed, with estimates ranging from one (Associated Press) to six (local news site Sahafah). Local officials told reporters the strike was carried out by a US drone.

strike.narrative: On Monday, a drone missile 'missed,' injuring 2 people nearby.
strike.bij_summary_short: Several outlets reported that at least two people were injured when a suspected US drone strike hit a car on the main highway of Al Bayda province, near the city of Radaa.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired at least one missile, killing 2 people and 'completely destroying' their car.
strike.bij_summary_short: Residents and local officials said a suspected US drone strike killed two alleged AQAP members in the southeastern province of Hadramout. Reuters reported that the drone 'fired at least one missile' on a car in Hadramout's Al-Qatan district, 'completely destroying the vehicle and killing two people'.

strike.narrative: While walking home, a Yemeni farmer was killed by shrapnel from a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: Either a farmer or an alleged al Qaeda member was reportedly killed in an early morning strike. This was the first report of civilian casualties in Yemen in 2014. Witnesses told Reuters drones fired two missiles but shrapnel hit a farmer walking home in the early hours.

strike.narrative: Driving along a road in Wadi Abeeda, 3-5 people were killed from above.
strike.bij_summary_short: A reported drone strike destroyed a car. Local media named one of the dead as Mohammed Saeed Jardan - a local of Abeeda.

strike.narrative: On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A suspected US drone strike on a vehicle killed an al Shabaab commander and others about 200 miles south of Mogadishu, Associated Press and a local media site reported. Anonymous US officials briefed the media on the strike.

strike.narrative: Jaber was sleeping near his car when the missile arrived. 3 people killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: Quoting local sources, Andolu News Agency suggested Shebwani was sleeping by his car when the drone allegedly struck. 'The fighter Jaber al Shabwani of the Al Shabwan tribe was sleeping near his vehicle in an open area before the drone launched a missile that hit his vehicle and killed him immediately,' the sources said.

strike.narrative: The second drone strike of the day killed 1 person in Abyan.
strike.bij_summary_short: The second air strike in as many days killed at least one person, Walid al Jemayzeh. The attack reportedly narrowly missed killing Abdul Hameed Memon Hatem, a self-identified member of AQAP - reportedly a senior figure.

strike.narrative: In the province of Shabwa, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: The third strike of the day killed two to four people. Local media reported two unnamed militants were killed along with two 'others', possibly meaning civilians.

strike.narrative: 3 people were killed while driving through al Jawf. It was the fourth reported drone strike of the week.
strike.bij_summary_short: The fourth strike in three days killed between two and four alleged AQAP members as they drove through northern Jawf province. The vehicle was destroyed in the attack. An alleged local militant leader, Ali Saleh Jraim (aka Ali Juraym), was reportedly killed with 1-3 unnamed associates.

strike.narrative: On Monday night, a US drone fired 3 missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least one person was killed in the fifth airstrike on Yemen in eight days. Initial reports were conflicted - either one, two or four people were killed when one or two vehicles were destroyed. The attack hit at night, suggesting it was a US drone strike - the Yemen Air Force is incapable of flying strike missions at night. Three missiles were reportedly fired on the vehicle, destroying it.

strike.narrative: 2 people--Moajab bin Aziz and Ali Hasan Hadhban--were killed in Jebel Jame.
strike.bij_summary_short: An airstrike destroyed a vehicle, killing Moajab bin Aziz and Ali Hasan Hadhban.
names: Moajab bin Aziz, Ali Hasan Hadhban

strike.narrative: Missiles struck 'two huts' in Mahfad, killing 3 people. 'Drones are still hovering over the area.'
strike.bij_summary_short: Three were killed in the first strike in Yemen in 20 days.

strike.narrative: 15 people--including 3 of Salem's friends--were killed by a US drone.
strike.bij_summary_short: A US drone strike on two cars killed at least 13 people -- three civilians among them -- in the Sawmaa area of Yemen's southeastern al Bayda province.

strike.narrative: After dawn prayers, three drone strikes shook Mahfad, killing 25 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: A series of air strikes hit alleged AQAP training camps in Yemen's southern Abyan province. The attacks follow a reported US drone strike the previous day in which at least three civilians were reportedly killed.
names: Jarullah Ibn Sheikh Abdelmajid al Hattari

strike.narrative: Late on Sunday, another strike flipped a car in Shabwa, killing 5 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: Elite US and Yemeni Special Forces soldiers ambushed a car in Shabwa, an eastern Yemeni province to the north of location of the previous two attacks. At least three people were killed. Unnamed US officials told the New York Times the CIA had carried out the drone strikes.

strike.narrative: 6 people killed.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least four people were killed in a US drone strike in Mareb. They were travelling in a vehicle travelling to a farm in the area. Witnesses named two of the victims as: Naif Faraj and Mousleh al Arahabi.
names: Naif Faraj,Mousleh al Arahabi

strike.narrative: On Wednesday night, a US drone strike killed 3 men in a Suzuki.
strike.bij_summary_short: At least three alleged AQAP members were killed in a reported US drone strike on a vehicle in Wadi Abeeda - also the site of the previous reported strike.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a truck, killing 6 people and damaging two nearby houses.
strike.bij_summary_short: The first drone strike in almost six months reportedly hit a house and vehicle. Early reports put the death toll at three, rising to 'at least four' and as many as six people had died. An intelligence official said the drone targeted a pick-up truck parked against the outer wall of a housing compound, setting both on fire. But locals told NBC that the vehicle had been driving through the village when it came under attack, and the damage to buildings may have been unintended: 'Two nearby houses were partially damaged in the missile strikes, but the target was the truck,' said resident Yar Mohammad.

strike.narrative: Missiles split the night in Dande Darpa Khel, killing 10 people and injuring four.
strike.bij_summary_short: Hours after the five-month hiatus in drone strikes ended, drones fired multiple missiles at alleged militants, reportedly killing either six or 10 people.

strike.narrative: Five people driving. A buzzing above. A missile arrived, ending the lives of 'all 5 passengers.'
strike.bij_summary_short: At least five alleged AQAP members were killed when their vehicle or convoy of vehicles was hit by several missiles fired by a US drone.

strike.narrative: Ten years after the first CIA drone strike in Pakistan, missiles hit a house, killing 6 people.
strike.bij_summary_short: The third strike of the month killed at least five alleged militants in the early hours - around 4-4.30am. Most sources reported as many as six missiles hit a house and a vehicle on the outskirts of Miranshah - the capital of North Waziristan. Some sources reported the vehicle was inside the walls of housing compound when the strike hit while others were less specific.

strike.narrative: A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people.
Fifteen people were killed when a US drone attacked a house in Datta Khel.
Six missiles extinguished 15 people as they slept in tents and mud houses.
Two missiles hit a house. 'The bodies of the five people killed were charred beyond recognition.'
3 people were killed and two women were wounded when a US drone attacked a house in Marib.
Three men were driving along a desert road when a drone fired missiles at them, killing all three.
Ahmed was in the forest. Four drone missiles came out of the sky. Up to 8 people killed.
Four people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a pickup truck.
10 people killed.
On Friday night, Arafat's kids were hit with drone shrapnel. Three people were killed.
Four people suspected of being militants were killed by an American drone.
Five people were killed and 3 others were wounded when missiles struck Shawal Valley.
Eight people killed, six wounded. "Habib's death could not be independently verified."
Third attack in three days killed 6 people.
Hours later, four people were killed when a missile struck the village of Kundser.
Two people were killed in the 5th U.S. drone strike of the week.
Two more missiles. Three people killed. Sixth CIA drone strike since Sunday.
Multiple missiles killed four people in Khyber.
2 people killed in a car.
Four people were killed when U.S. drone missiles struck a Toyota Hilux.
Three people killed. 'The drone was still circling the area.'
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 5 people.
At least 10 people were killed when U.S. drones struck the town of Radda.
Overnight, five people were killed, their bodies 'obliterated beyond recognition.'
Two men were riding a motorcycle. A drone fired missiles at them. Their bodies are 'charred.'
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 4-7 people.
Seven people were killed while gathered under a group of trees.
Six people were killed when a U.S. drone fired missiles at a house.
Eight people killed, two injured. "There may be more dead bodies under the rubble."
Missiles hit a house, killing four people.
A U.S. drone fired two missiles at the town of Datta Khel, killing 5 people.
Two U.S. drone strikes killed 9 people in Shawal.
Abdishakur--or did he go by Tahliil?--died when a U.S. drone fired several missiles at a convoy.
Six people were killed when two U.S. drone missiles hit a building in Datta Khel.
Unmournable. A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 7 people and injuring 5.
A second U.S. drone strike killed 5 people in Tehsil Ladha.
Seven people killed, four injured. "The number of dead may go up."
Three people killed in a car.
Seven people killed in a house. Drones kept hovering, 'creating panic among the residents.'
On Saturday afternoon, in the desert town of al-Saeed, a U.S. drone strike killed 3 men in a car.
Yusef died near Dinsoor. 'Unclear how many others may have been killed.'
Four people were killed. 'The bodies inside the car were left charred.'
Overnight, while the former president hid in a food truck, a U.S. drone strike killed 3 people.
On Saturday, in the southern province of Shabwa, a U.S. drone strike killed 4 people.
At dawn, in an area called Markha, a U.S. drone strike killed 2 people in a car.
Hussein saw it happen at sunset. Three men killed. Drone missiles left them 'completely burnt.'
Two missiles slammed into a house, killing 4 people.
Ibrahim spent five years at Guantanamo. On Sunday, he was killed by an American drone.
As they sat down for a meal on the waterfront of Mukalla, a U.S. drone strike killed 5 people.
In Ataq, near the al Farouq mosque, a US drone strike killed 1-4 people.
Four people were killed at the palace entrance when a drone missile hit their car.
Late on Saturday, a US drone fired missiles at a pair of houses, killing 5 people.
The cease-fire ended. "Meanwhile, a suspected US drone strike hit a car carrying a group of people"
In the deep, forested ravines of Shawal, a US drone strike killed 5 people.
Several drones were flying. Four people were killed. Two missiles destroyed the car completely.
Nine people were killed in a house.
Near the port of Mukalla, a US drone fired 4 missiles at 3 people, 'killing them on the spot.'
On Wednesday night, a US drone strike killed 4 people in a car.
On Thursday, in the town of Rafadh, a US drone strike killed 5 people.
Abdul and Shuaib were driving with two others when a drone missile struck their car.
A U.S. drone strike killed 30 people.
Overnight, a US drone attacked a car in Abyan, killing 4 people.
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 4 people.
At dawn, as they drove along the coast, 5 people were killed. 'Bombs hit the men in their car.'
Three people were driving through the desert region of Harib. A drone strike ended their lives.
Four people were killed in Mukalla.
Five people gathered for a meeting. They were inside a house. A drone strike ended their conversation.
Two missiles struck a house, killing 6 people. Four others were wounded.
A U.S. drone strike killed four people in a car.
On Saturday, two U.S. drone missiles hit a car in al-Jawf. 'The four men were not immediately identified.'
On the outskirts of Marib, a U.S. drone strike killed 2 people in a car.
Explosions shook Balad Amin. Five people were killed.
